medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 24 hours prior to admission, starting in the back and gradually moving to the right lower quadrant. No nausea or vomiting reported, but there was a loss of appetite, subjective fevers, and chills. No changes in bowel habits noted. No prior similar episodes.
medical_history.past_medical_history: HIV+, in treatment (normal CD4 count and undetectable viral load), tonsillectomy, incision and drainage of inguinal abscess.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus, Hypertension, and Hypercholesterolemia.
